tool_config.name: jump_to_exercise
tool_config.description: Jump to a specific exercise in the workout by exercise slug. Use this to navigate to any exercise in today's workout. This does NOT swap exercises - it just changes which exercise you're currently doing.

parameters.description: Parameters for jumping to a specific exercise

exerciseSlug.description: The slug of the exercise to jump to (e.g., 'push-ups', 'prisoner-squat', 'side-plank'). Get available exercises from get_workout_status()

reason.description: Optional reason for jumping to this exercise (e.g., 'user requested', 'skipping ahead')

tool_config.name: swap_exercise
tool_config.description: Swap the current exercise with one of its valid alternatives. Use this when equipment is unavailable or user wants a different exercise for the current position. Alternatives can ONLY replace the CURRENT exercise and must exist in workout_entry_alternatives. After swap, the old exercise becomes an alternative automatically.

parameters.description: Parameters for swapping current exercise with an alternative

exerciseSlug.description: The slug of the alternative exercise to swap to (e.g., 'diamond-push-ups', 'push-ups'). Must be a valid alternative for the current exercise. Get available alternatives from get_workout_status() -> currentExerciseAlternatives

reason.description: Optional reason for the swap (e.g., 'equipment unavailable - no dumbbells', 'user preference')
